mapper.select: SELECT C.CONTRACT_ID AS contractId,C.USER_ID AS userId,C.ENTERPRIES AS enterpries,C.CONTRACT_CODE AS contractCode, C.SIGN_TIME AS signTime, C.END_TIME AS endTime,C.START_TIME AS startTime,C.POOL_POSITION poolPosition,C.CONTRACT_TYPE contractType,C.USER_NAME AS userName,C.SIGN_TYPE AS signType FROM HR_CONTRACT C WHERE C.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND C.USER_ID = (SELECT U.USER_ID FROM HR_USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID='8EADB678-A646-1E51-3E87-75A547B8AF19' AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=#{orgId})
